Windows XP: C:\Documents and Settings\yourAccountUserName\Local Settings\Application Data\2K Games\Mafia II\

Since I installed this one I can't load a chapter from the meny. Only free mode is available. How do I get it fixed? :/

Ok I found the problem. This game was saved with "made man pack" installed. If you do not have this pack installed you won't be able to load a chapter. You'll need to start from scratch OR download the pack.
